environment.configuration.title: Environment Variables
environment.configuration.enabled.descri: Enable the Positron environment variable collection.
Environment variables to set in all Positron terminals and consoles.
environment.configuration.variables.appe: Values to append to existing environment variables, naming the variable to append to and the value to append.
environment.configuration.variables.prep: Values to prepend to existing environment variables, naming the variable to prepend to and the value to prepend.
